auto_memory_capture._comment: Automatically capture observations from Claude Code actions
auto_memory_capture._comment_max_length: Maximum character length for auto-captured memories

auto_events._comment: Automatically publish events on memory changes
auto_events._comment_batch: Publish events in batches to reduce overhead

auto_deduplication._comment_hour: Hour of day to run (0-23, UTC)
auto_deduplication._comment_approval: Require user approval before applying deduplication
auto_deduplication._comment_threshold: Similarity threshold (0.0-1.0) to consider memories duplicate

auto_summarization._comment: Scheduled automatic summarization of old memories
auto_summarization._comment_day: Day of month to run monthly summarization
auto_summarization._comment_age: Summarize memories older than this many days
auto_summarization._comment_length: Minimum character length to consider for summarization
auto_summarization._comment_preserve: Always preserve original content in metadata
auto_summarization._comment_ratio: Target summary length as ratio of original (0.0-1.0)

auto_categorization._comment: Automatically categorize memories by content analysis
auto_categorization._comment_auto: Create new categories if none match

auto_sharing._comment: Automatically set sharing policies based on content analysis
auto_sharing._comment_optin: User must explicitly opt-in to enable auto-sharing
auto_sharing._comment_notify: Notify user when memories are auto-shared

auto_cognify._comment: Automatically process documents into knowledge graph
auto_cognify._comment_watch: Paths to watch for new documents
auto_cognify._comment_min_size: Minimum file size in KB to process
auto_cognify._comment_max_size: Maximum file size in MB to process

auto_updates._comment: Smart memory updates with intent detection
auto_updates._comment_max_history: Maximum number of history entries to keep

auto_sync._comment_schedule: Options: every_5min, every_15min, every_30min, hourly, daily
auto_sync._comment_conflict: Options: most_recent, keep_both, source_wins, target_wins, manual

audit_logging._comment: Audit logging for all automated actions
audit_logging._comment_db: Store audit logs in PostgreSQL for analytics
audit_logging._comment_retention: How long to keep audit logs

undo_management._comment_max: Maximum number of undo operations to keep
undo_management._comment_undo_retention: How long to keep undo history
undo_management._comment_preserve: Always preserve original data before modifications

notifications._comment_approval: Notify when user approval is required

approval_workflow._comment_delete: Require approval for any deletion operations
approval_workflow._comment_timeout: Auto-reject pending approvals after this many hours
approval_workflow._comment_storage: Path to store approval request data
approval_workflow._comment_auto: Auto-approve operations that preserve originals (e.g., summarization)
approval_workflow._comment_max_pending: Maximum pending approvals before queueing new requests

performance._comment_queue: Maximum queue size for pending automations
performance._comment_retry: Number of retry attempts for failed operations

security._comment_agents: Empty = all agents allowed. Specific agents = whitelist
security._comment_max_ops: Maximum automation operations per hour per agent

development._comment_dry_run: Run all automations in dry-run mode (no actual changes)
